idea-plugin.name: Artemis_string_normalizer
idea-plugin.description:
Artemis String Normalizer

A postfix template that converts artemis encoded strings into clean, readable Java string expressions.

Features

  • Replaces the special symbol ⎵ with a real space
  • Converts variables inside <...> into Java identifiers
  • Automatically concatenates text and variable segments
  • Removes invalid placeholders (e.g. with spaces)
  • Works in all file types via postfix .artemis

Example

"(/)⎵Enter⎵your⎵guess:".artemis
-->
"(" + X + "/" + Y + ") Enter your guess:"
